#3.10
Fileset Editor
To specify a fileset, you need to select the files and move them to the appropriate fileset type--parser or scanner.
Click the C language toggle.
As you can see, jello.c is now selected.
Click the Move Files Parser button.
Notice jello.c has now been moved to the scanner Fileset.
Click the jello.c file to select it
jello.c is now highlighted in the Scanner Fileset window.
Now click the upward pointing arrow to the right of the Transfer Files label.
The jello.c file has now been added to the Parser fileset list and will be parsed when the database is built.
Click on the bottom right arrow to continue.
